job.description: pstrongPositionstrongnbspMachine Learning EngineerppstrongLocationstrongnbsp100 RemoteppstrongDurationstrongnbsp6month ContracttoHireppstrongStartstrongnbspASAPppnbspppstrongJob DescriptionObjectivestrongppThis will be a 6month contract with fulltime employee conversion This is a 100 remote role where you will be working on an exciting cuttingedge teamnbspThis position develops efficient and scalable data science systems that enable integration of machine learning ML applications into healthcare operations strategy value improvement care advancement patient safety and satisfactionnbspThis position will partner with data scientists application developers data architects and system engineers to recommend and develop ML systems and pipelinesnbspThis position will be responsible for learning recommending and implementing cutting edge machine learning methodologies and tools in creative and novel waysppnbspppThis person would be the tone setter and first one in the Machine Learning Engineer role with their plan to build out a team behind youppnbspppstrongFun Fact about our relationship with this client strongWe have placed half of their data architect team over the last 18 months with GREAT feedback on culture and the leadershipppnbspppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliCI  CD ExperienceliliData Engineering experience full project life cycle deployment to productionliliSome sort of data science exposureliliExperience doing endtoend implementation of an ML pipeline for ML model deploymentliliSQL amp Python experienceliul
